short_summary: Purchase of 3D FDM printers & cleaning machine for RCMP Depot in Regina Saskatchewan
description: The RCMP depot requires Fused Deposition Modeling (FDM) 3D printers with increased build volume to enhance design and manufacturing options and reduce outsourcing costs.
duration_in_months: Institution does not specify the estimated duration
full_summary:
----------------

# 3D Fused Deposition Modeling (FDM) Printer and Cleaning Apparatus Tender

**Notice Number:** CB-643-32440256
**Amendment Number:** 8
**Solicitation Number:** M5000-24-00970/B

**Publication Date:** October 16, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** November 6, 2023, at 15:00:00

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) Depot in Regina, Saskatchewan requires Fused Deposition Modeling (FDM) 3D printers with increased build volume to support prototyping and manufacturing end-use parts. Current limitations with existing printers restrict the size of parts that can be printed at one time, necessitating outsourcing for projects that cannot be printed in-house.

**Contract Details**

* **UNSpsc:** Printing machinery and equipment (45101500)
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity:** Regina, Saskatchewan
* **Regions of Delivery:** Saskatchewan, Canada

**Contracting Entity**

* **Name:** Vince Millan, Royal Canadian Mounted Police
* **Address:** 5th floor, 10065 Jasper Place NW, Edmonton, Alberta, T5J 3B1 Canada

**Contact Information**

* **Name:** Vince Millan
* **Email:** [Vince.Millan@rcmp-grc.gc.ca](mailto:Vince.Millan@rcmp-grc.gc.ca)
* **Phone:** (587) 340-9715

**Attachments**

* Solicitation - M5000-24-00970-A-NPP-ENG.pdf
* Solicitation - M5000-24-00970-Solicitation-am001.pdf
* French Version of the Solicitation - M5000-24-00970-Solicitation-am001-FRA.pdf

The RCMP is seeking proposals for the provision of Fused Deposition Modeling (FDM) 3D printers with increased build volume to support prototyping and manufacturing end-use parts. Proposals should include detailed technical specifications and pricing. The lowest price proposal will be selected.

Note: Please refer to the attachments for complete tender requirements and specifications.
